page.title: 18Mark Carter -Blacksmith.
page.content: Mark Carter is a registered blacksmith working in Aldershot.To qualify as a {farrier}he underwent a 4 year apprenticeship with a master farrer,attended Hereford college and passed the Diploma of the Worshipful company of Farriers examintions.To set up on his he needed to buy the following equipment:_{hoof pairers, } buffers, knifes,tongs, nails, forge, anvil,{shoe turning hammers,}pinchers and a leather apron. On a typical days work he will receive a phone call at 7am from a customer, Mark will then travel by car to the customer. The{horseshoes}are made in the after noon ready for the next day. He usually finishes work about 6pm although it can be later. Mark does not just make horse shoes he also trims the horses feet.He decided to become a farrier as he liked horses
